website_summaries.verdict: A super-durable stainless steel mortar and pestle option for the clumsy cook.
pros: Stainless steel components are easy to clean
Heavy enough that it won't move around while you mash
Looks good on display in a modern kitchen
cons: A small percentage of users complained of units arriving with small rust stains

customer_reviews.title: I got the impression it is a metal product - while in fact, it is a plastic coated with steel
customer_reviews.text: That is a great disappointment, since a whole-metal one has its own effect and advantage while crashing and grinding the spices. the weight and the mass. This one feels like a toy, and it is far away from the experience I was expecting to get.
customer_reviews.author: Tzury

customer_reviews.title: Fresh cardamom for tea!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Feels heavy and solid. Cleans up easily. I use it to crush cardamom seeds for tea (1/2 pod per cup), but will surely find other uses too. I think the size is perfect. The rubber ring on the bottom creates a light suction on our granite counter when I press down on it, and that holds it securely. Not sure if that was an intentional design feature but I like it. Very glad I chose this one over others.
customer_reviews.author: provadance

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! I use it to crush pills for my patients who aren't able to swallow pills whole. The pill crusher at work leaves a lot to be disired. This crushes even the hardest pill to a fine powder to mix with some applesauce to make it easier for my elderly patients to get their medicines.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Great stainless mortar and pestle!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mortar and pestle. It has a weighted base and a foam ring that keeps it from running off on you. I bough to use in my darkroom to compound chemicals. The stainless steel construction means little to no contamination and no rock dust. The bowl isn't polished but has a slightly rough texture to aid in crushing. The pestle has a good heft to it and is comfortable in the hand. Definitely would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ian MazurskyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Scratched sides with first use
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how this is so well rated. I've used this once, and the sides are scratched. I used it to mix micas and a mineral foundation base, and the sides scratched from using it as intended. Every ingredient is face safe, and a small particle size, so nothing sharp or oddly shaped. I'm not happy, but with its low price, I guess what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Kernc

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Crush Herbs or Spices the Way I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mortar and pestle set for awhile now, and it doesn't work nearly as well as the marble one I used to use. (I would still be using the old one but the marble pestle rolled off the counter one day and broke in two) The slick surfaces of both mortar and pestle seem to push the material around rather than just crushing it. I finally put the base away and just use the pestle in my old marble mortar.
customer_reviews.author: Roy S

customer_reviews.title: Several uses with this from edibles to gunpowder so save time and buy two.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what all my wife uses this for but I see this on my kitchen counter every day as if taunting me that she got the mail before I did. The grinding bowl was originally bought for my powder room to grind down gun powder and other misc. but somehow it never made it there and was extracted and enlisted in kitchen detail so it never made it to the shop. So I'm back to get another one for the workshop, hopefully I get this one from the mailman and can hide it.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!!! I have spent so much money on pill cutters and crushers. They hurt my hand/wrist (arthritis) and sometimes I don't take a pill because I can't crush it. My vitamins are huge and get locked up in the other crushers. Sometimes the cheap cutters break when I cut a pill to make it smaller to crush it. But, with this Bekith I don't have to cut any pills and it crushes with hardly any effort. This is a fantastic product as well as good quality! Thank you to all who left reviews - I never thought of using a mortar.
customer_reviews.author: Jul

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful tool! I have to crush up very small pills. I needed to contain the pill so it doesn't fly off to never be seen again. This was the solution. This is very well made. It has a very sturdy base mortar and the pestle is equally well made. It even looks good sitting on my counter. I would highly recommend this for anyone needing to crush medicine. I have never used it for cooking purposes so I cannot review it for that. Overall, I highly recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: v2can5

customer_reviews.title: Lies! Not 304 SS
customer_reviews.text: Not true magnet attaches to item. Double 304 stainless steel construction, heavy and durable. Given Raw iron is ferromagnetic, meaning you can attract it with a magnet, and you can make a magnet from it. The 430 grade stainless steel is also ferromagnetic. However, 304 is not. Type 430 steel is less expensive and is somewhat difficult to form and weld than type 304.
customer_reviews.author: Denise S. Acerbi

customer_reviews.title: Works really well but I was surprised the bowl had ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well but I was surprised the bowl had so many pits/grooves in it. I ordered this for a pill crusher and specifically wanted stainless steel over marble or granite because I felt it would not have the natural grooves and pits of stone. Since it did have this aspect to it, it was a little difficult to get all the crushed pill out. Haven't used it for herbs but would probably have same results. Vendor needs to stipulate the inner bowl is NOT polished.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Build is nice and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Build is nice and is easy to clean. However, in trying to smash whole, wet (after cleaning) garlic cloves, I noticed something I should have noticed earlier: because it is made of stainless steel, if whatever you are trying to smash is wet, small, and compact, it will slide all over the place instead of getting crushed. Otherwise, it is a good product. However, I would advise considering what you, personally, use the mortar for most before deciding on a type. Stainless steel might not be the best idea for non-dry ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Allaw

customer_reviews.title: Great solid stainless steel mortar and pestle
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be a great value for the money. I bought this for my wife as she "needed" a new one to replace her old one. It looks premium and feels solid and it takes little effort to pound the pulp out of what ever it is you're looking to pound. We'll have to see how durable it is as we continue to use it but no rust or corrosion so far like the other reviews have mentioned. I would recommend this if you're looking to replace the traditional mortar and pestle.
customer_reviews.author: Ky N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and quality for me.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I have recently changed my diet to allow for natural food, including lots of seeds. This product works great for smashing seeds. I am impressed with the sleek design and good size. The rubber ring on the bottom keeps it from sliding around when I am using it. The stainless steel design will allow me to keep it for many years of use. I will not be using it in my dishwasher because I don't want to take a chance on loosening the bottom rubber ring, but it is very easy to clean so that is not an issue. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Old cntry gal

customer_reviews.title: Well suited for making coarse spice mixes
customer_reviews.text: We use it in our indian kitchen that has a high demand due to number spices we use. This one handles all demands quite well. From making wet mixes like mixture of garlic and ginger to dry ones like black pepper and cardamom - good results that I am fully satisfied with. It has anti-slip base. At first I was sceptic to use on counter as i thought might damage the quartz, but for small amounts its not a problem. However, if you want to hard on dry seeds or similar, i would suggest using it on the floor or other wooden surfaces where it can take the beating.
customer_reviews.author: Deepak Mohapatra

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad as well
customer_reviews.text: I thought metal would good built for such thing. But i think i was wrong. It can crush something but not all. Specially when i tried to use this for garlic then it is not good. I couldn't crush them. It just try to run out of this. Using provided lid i managed to do it after trying for long time. So it is wasting time. If you need this not for garlic then you can get it but if specially for anything like garlic reconsider metal build. I still kept it myself.
customer_reviews.author: R Pdl

customer_reviews.title: Not useful
customer_reviews.text: Slick surfaces are not useful for mashing food, like avocados for guacamole. Unfortunately I let time lapse so I couldn’t return item, or I would have.
customer_reviews.author: MeCal Poston

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Was worried this would slip around on the countertop because it was stainless. However, it's heavy and has a doughnut shaped rubber foot that keeps it in place. I'm very pleased with it. It's dishwasher safe, and when the foot wears away from too many dishwasher runs, I'm sure I can buy something at Lowes/Home Despot to keep it from moving. It's easy to clean and can take a beating. I'm glad I bought stainless now.
customer_reviews.author: W Bee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Only slight dislike is that the pestle could be a bit longer, but I am a big guy. Much better than stone materials as it has rolled off the counter and hit a concrete floor with no damage. Also easy to clean, stone mortars pick up stains, oils, and odors from what is being processed. No problem with stainless steel. I also like the rubber pad on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: 'which it's Preserved Killick here'

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a great product.
customer_reviews.text: This mortar/pestle is way better than expected. I love stainless steel for the ease of cleaning and sanitizing. It's thick and heavy and the SS is polished nicely. (There is a tablespoon in the picture just to show scale.)
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: this thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: i like everything about it! i bought it to crush up some abrasive for polishing things. if i had bought something porous, i would not have been able to use it for anything else. it works better than i could have hoped. the lid keeps chunks from flying, and the pestle feels really good in my hand. if you want to grind up abrasive to make a usable polish, put in a few drops of mineral oil. it makes a nice paste that is useful for many things.
customer_reviews.author: fred s.

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish. Looks and feels cheap and does not do ...
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish. Looks and feels cheap and does not do the job. The pestle is way to skinny and light and this works less than half as well as a stone mortar pestle. Tried using it a few times, tossed it in the recycle bin today.
customer_reviews.author: Jay S.

customer_reviews.title: Brushed Stainless Steel Mortar and Pestle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this about 5 months ago and have used it about 4 to 6 times a week ever since. it's perfect quality and serves it purpose very well. I have ground up mostly spices in this, but have used it for OTC medicine a couple of times as well. It takes seconds to grind up and all of 20 seconds to wash. It's very sturdy, but that also means it has weight so keep that in mind before ordering. All in all, definitely a worthy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality, substantial weight, sleek!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Mortar is VERY substantial, a perfect weight, doesn't slide around when you use it. Comfortable and easy to use for everything from mint (mojitos!) to grinding spices (fresh peppercorns!). Brushed stainless steel looks sleek, doesn't absorb odors, and is dishwasher safe. You won't be sorry with this purchase if you're looking for a quality mortar and pestle!
customer_reviews.author: PPM

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Since the quarantine we have been cooking a lot at home, so thanks to Gordon Ramsay and master chef we are cooking up a storm. Since we have been cooking so much we found ourselves in need of a mortar and pestle. Traditionally these are made out of stone however I really liked the look of this one. Shipping was pretty quick and it works well, I really like the plastic lid that helps when crushing seeds. I don’t know why there is an “easy to swallow” star rating but it wouldn’t be easy to swallow and I wouldn’t recommend trying to.
customer_reviews.author: Whovian family

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean!
customer_reviews.text: Steel Mortar and Pestle is easy to clean and doesn't hold flavors which is really helpful trying to make your own spice extracts. I bought this to grind spices, seeds and supplement powders, it does a really good job and doesn't make a mess. however it is a bit challenging to pour from. I've found it best to dump out onto something else before transferring into small containers.
customer_reviews.author: JordanUnicycle

customer_reviews.title: Soooo nice!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a mortar and pestle to grind up the furbabies' very hard glucosamine tablets which they get every other day. This works like a charm, and as an added perk, it looks awesome in my kitchen. No need to hide it in the closet... it's a work of art. Also a cinch to wipe out. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: KarenR

customer_reviews.title: Does the job without any problems!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE mortar and pestle set to have. No matter what you are grinding ,crushing this is the set to use. It has the size and weight to handle any job you have planned. I was torn between this and the marble. I am glad I got this one. I guess it has a bit of an industrial look to it. I like the contrast with my other more organic kitchen wares. Whatever I'm wanting to crush, for me various spices I haven't found a nut it would not crack.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Best mortar and pestle around!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband to make masala chai, and he loves it! It is exactly as advertised and looks really beautiful in our kitchen. You can grind up anything in this thing. It's one of the best things we have bought for our house, and a bargain for this price imo. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: chelsea king

customer_reviews.title: it came with some brown stains on the handle that look like rust stains
customer_reviews.text: This unit arrived with a few blemishes; it came with some brown stains on the handle that look like rust stains. I used some 0000 steel wool to polish them out but it's still not pristine and blemish-free. My suggestion would be to purchase this in a store where it can be examined before buying it. However it works very well for the purpose for which it was intended and there are no problems there, only on the exterior finish.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G

customer_reviews.title: Great price, quality, durability
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly crafted. Decent size and very sturdy and durable. Works for herbs, pills, spices, even could burn something in it worse case scenario being steel. Has micro groves that hold spices, etc, in place as to crush.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Don't know why they have an easy "to swallow" rating.
customer_reviews.text: Fist off, if you can fit this thing into your mouth, you probably don't need it. Now for the rest of us "normal" folks out here, it works great. Since it's Stainless Steel, it's very easy to clean, just wash it with water, or wipe it out with a damp cloth. Works great to grind grind pills with, makes then into a fine powder.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin

customer_reviews.title: How can a mortar made of metal not be durable ?
customer_reviews.text: This is the husbands review. It looks durable and good. I did not really have a hard pounding session on it to conclude anything. My moms mortar made of metal was heavier by far more durable like you could bang the life out of it for ages and it would not die. This one seems just fine but I really wanted the one my mum had and this one was the closest. I tried couple of times. It does the job
customer_reviews.author: maria tears

customer_reviews.title: Will be giving my other M&Ps away, this one surpasses them nicely.  Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This M&P is the best one I've ever come across! The quality is Superb! My other ones will never be used again. I don't know why but the stainless steel crushes the herbs so much easier and with better results than my marble one. It has a nice, heavy weight to it that makes it feel substantial. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Using it to crush and compound my dog's meds. Pros: Heavy, well made, bomb proof, washable Con: When you grind things the metal surface is rubbed off and evident in the paste. (my crushed pills essentially turn to a grey paste).
customer_reviews.author: hesty24

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My Need
customer_reviews.text: For health issues, I want to eat more nuts, but with denture problems, I need to crush them up and put them in smoothy type drinks.This works perfectly to crush up the nuts. I've also used it to crush up pills for my dog, stuff he won't easily take. I mix it in his food and he doesn't notice. Aside from all that, this looks pretty nice just as something to sit out by the stove. It's almost like an ornament, it looks so good.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for crushing medications
customer_reviews.text: I am my mother, who has dementia, sole caregiver, and I have to crush all of her medications because she cannot swallow pills at all. It works super fast and is very easy to clean. It is heavy and very nice. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars for durability is that it already has a dent in the rim. Other than that, I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: a s.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: This tool has been a great addition to the kitchen. I've done spices, sugars, and various nuts and have been very happy with results. I did some research prior to purchase between the metal and stone types. Glad I did, as stone tends to retain some bits of food and this one cleans up well. In addition, the cover is a great value add-on as it helps keep food from flying all over. Though I wish the material of the lid was a bit sturdier. I can see myself needing to buy replacement lids in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Panzer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift so I haven’t used it but I can attest to the fact that it is weighty and looks nice. The clear lid can be use to prevent the pills from flying out while you are crushing them. I am pleased with this purchase and certain my daughter will like it.
customer_reviews.author: AllThatIs

customer_reviews.title: GREAT...BUT NEED STAINLESS STEEL CLEANER
customer_reviews.text: We have the typical porcelain, marble & wood mortar & pestles. This stainless steel unit is really nice, especially, with its rubber ring base to prevent sliding. You need to buy a jar of stainless steel metal polish to remove any stains if you'd like to keep it nice. Of course, the cleaner will take care of all stainless steel pans. We also use it for a 20 qt/L canning container.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, in a good way. I use it primarily for crushing pills. The bowl and pestle tip seems slightly textured, which is ideal. Cleans easily. The rubber pad on the base keeps it from slipping, but I think it stays moist for hours, and may mildew. Priced well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Koressel

customer_reviews.title: Powdered sugar at home!
customer_reviews.text: There are some parts where I wish it had been machined or polished to a higher degree of smoothness.. But, that aside, it's a very functional pestle and mortar. I can make small quantities of powdered sugar from granulated sugar using this--which is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Evil Mike

customer_reviews.title: A necessary part of your kitchen if you use great spices
customer_reviews.text: This little guy has proved to be very useful. It’s much smaller than you think but works great for most small jobs and for dinners for 2 to 4 people. I love that it doesn’t stain, and that it cleans up easily and I don’t have to worry about chipping it
customer_reviews.author: Tari

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: My first one to own. Good quality, good price, and visually attractive for leaving on the countertop. I like the size. It might be too small for other people. So far I've used it to break up hard breath mints and to crush organic egg shells into a fine powder. It worked great on the mints, but not so good on the egg shells. I had to use my Vitamix for them.
customer_reviews.author: bdb

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing since the invention of toilet paper.
customer_reviews.text: If you have ever tried to use a plastic pill crusher with hand problems, you will know what pain is In trying to crush pills for my wife, I always had problems with gripping the plastic pill. NOW I can grip the pistil and slowly crush the pills into a fine powder. Very solid, stays on the counter when you are using it, yet light enough to lift with one hand. Not wxpensive BUT WELL WORTH THE PRICE
customer_reviews.author: D. at LLRC

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel Pestle and mortar
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasently surprised with the weight an size an it was very very sturdy for the price it was definitely a very great deal this will definitely crush up medication an I would very highly recommend it also fast shipping too 🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, doesn't serve the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Looks polished and smooth. But doesn't grind well. Ingredients slip easily while pounding. Pestle cracked after 3 months of use
customer_reviews.author: smartsubbu

customer_reviews.title: Bad Material
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I feel like it is my fault for thinking that a stainless steel mortar and pestle would be a good idea... It's not! It does not grind well at all! I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary I.

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful, Functional Product!
customer_reviews.text: My Mother has trouble swallowing pills as she had throat cancer. This crushes the pill into a fine powder that she can mix into some food, pudding or liquid. I'm sure she'll use it for spices and other things as it is easy to clean. It also has a snap on lid which is a remarkable addition to the normal mortar and pestle offerings. This is a solid, beautiful, substantial piece that also looks lovely on the counter. It really is a work of art.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Do just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This does just what I got it for: smashing lumps that 'grow' in the Xylitol that I use as a toot paste. That;s my main use, although they have come in handy for other uses once in a while, I got hese because I had lost the mortar and pestle I knew we had, Then I found them. These are better because those are wooden.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be of good quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pestle to facilitate in the making of sauces and pastes used in cooking. In the past, I would struggle trying to mash garlic for my aioli sauces. This item will make the job much easier. The stainless steel is of good quality with no discoloration or imperfections that I have noted. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AKP

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: I use this to crush pills for my pup, so I can mix it in peanut butter. It does exactly what I need it to do. Doesn't take too much effort. I just take a damp paper towel to wipe it out since I exclusively use it for just the one thing.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great size and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Needed a different one as my last got something in it that rotted and ruined as SOMEONE left it out wity stuff in it while I was gone haha, perfect size and super easy to use! Also super easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Michael spencer

customer_reviews.title: This is like a piece of art.
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this come fast but when I opened it the box looked a little worse for wear... I worried. Worry NOT! This is so incredibly beautiful it is like a piece of art. It's heavy and well made and I will not put it in a drawer but display it. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Poulin

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel is a huge plus!
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy base, I picked this one over others specifically for being stainless steel. Don’t have to worry about it cracking or being porous. It works as intended and would recommend. If I had to change anything it would be the pestle head to be a bit bigger, other then that it works perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: Susan T

customer_reviews.title: Mortar and pestle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tools for grinding hard surfaces into powder. It works great for herbs I use for cooking. I also make potpourri from it. Easy to clean and top keeps things from flying out!
customer_reviews.author: M Sammis

customer_reviews.title: The lid is a great idea
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to my kitchen. It is very solid and easy to clean. I use it for all of my fresh herbs. The lid keeps things from coming out of the pestle while working. It makes it a lot cleaner. I definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: I love this! And it won't break when I accidentally ...
customer_reviews.text: This works so well that I can't help but wonder why I was so hesitant to buy a non-marble one. I love this! And it won't break when I accidentally drop it onto the floor (like I did my little marble one).
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Robin

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute!
customer_reviews.text: Ya it’s really small! Lol But I’m the only one gonna use it so it’s all G. It’s pretty heavy so that’s a plus. I haven’t tried it yet so we’ll see how it holds up....ILYK 😉
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and made well
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that it's not plastic and its very sturdy. So far it has been good and sast to use and seems like it will last a long time. I will update if this changes. It seems like a good product to me.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Prine

customer_reviews.title: The worst mortar and pestle ever?
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this zero stars if possible. I'm shocked it's received so many good reviews. I tried to mash up garlic, chillis, and ginger and it was nearly impossible. Because it's stainless steel all of the ingredients were sliding all over the place, even out of the bowl! I got so frustrated I just dumped out the ingredients and chopped them up with a knife. After doing some research I learned that a good mortar and pestle should be rough on the inside so it traps the ingredients. What a total waste.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia Noyes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and works just as you would expext for a medium sized pedestal. I make crushed Zinc oxide pills and Baking soda, into a dusty mixture; used in my diabetic shoes. Works Great ! Combine this M& P with a pill splitter and you are in business for your favorite potions !
customer_reviews.author: Larry W.

customer_reviews.title: Not for cooking
customer_reviews.text: Like people have mentioned its good for crushing pills, that's all it does. If u want to use this for crushing spices or ginger and garlic it's just not the right thing to buy. It's light weight and things go flying out of the mortar when using it.
customer_reviews.author: Aneoz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and clean
customer_reviews.text: Works better than the wooden one I grew up issuing. Very easy to clean, just creates a lot of static after we dried and mashed our herbs from the garden. Otherwise we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Wyant

customer_reviews.title: Very well constructed and high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than I expected. I am mixing a metal abrasive slurry so it does lose its finish as I would have expected but the rest looks great. Great value for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Innovator

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful and effective tool.
customer_reviews.text: I grind egg shells into powder with this mortar & pestle. Functions great. Though not expensive, very solid look and feel. For me, beautiful appearance. Easy to keep clean. Nothing negative.
customer_reviews.author: lawhoc

customer_reviews.title: Pestl-ent Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to buy this because it was made of stainless steel. Now I am so glad that I did. It does the job it was purchased to do and is also easy to clean. It also looks nice in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This review asked me to rate whether this was easy to swallow! Um, no! Ha! However, it works terrific for grinding glass frit. Love the plastic cover.
customer_reviews.author: Hez

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Given as gift, used for both making at home hair masks and for kitchen use. Same model I got myself 4 years ago. Works well, lid/cover is nice option.
customer_reviews.author: J. BushTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: works great, one of the star questions is easy to swallow? one star for that because i don't know if a horse could swallow the thing. wtf amazon?
customer_reviews.author: Code

customer_reviews.title: Solid, heavy, durable, easy to clean, and looks sleek. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Solid, heavy, durable and clean. It has a rubber ring on the bottom to keep it from slipping. It is a good solid weight. Looks great too. I use this multiple times a day to crush meds for my fur baby and it is awesome. I wholeheartedly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Van Rikxoord

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clean that well in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: As the title says, I have trouble getting this clean when I run it through the dishwasher and this is after rinsing it and not using crazy sticky or otherwise hard to clean ingredients in the mortar and pestle.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Schantz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised... almost
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this one to replace a broken one we use to crush up the medication we give to our older dog. Arrived on time and in almost perfect condition. Has a small dent inside of the bowl but nothing bad enough to prevent us from using it.
customer_reviews.author: Travis L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, durable, working surfaces clean easily
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Just got it. First thing I ground was fenugreek seeds. I didn’t realize what a challenge that would be. After a few minutes, I got the hang of it. (More like hammering, than grinding) This thing is solid. Rinse, wipe, on to the next thing. Can’t imagine doing that, with anything but stainless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SANITARY AND NO RUST! 💗😇👍
customer_reviews.text: REALLY WELL MADE PRODUCT, GOOD FOR CRUSHING ALMOST ANYTHING, HEAVY DUTY SOLID SANITARY PRODUCT, RECOMMEND THIS ITEM FOR EVERYONE, NO RUST SO FAR SO GOOD, THANKS AND GODSPEED! 💗😇👍
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: The product works great!
customer_reviews.text: I kind of wish the bottom had rubber on it instead of felt so that if it got wet it wouldn't be an issue, but it's not that big of a deal. The product works great!
customer_reviews.author: Copperhead

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, but heavy enough to get the job done for grinding dry spices. Solid piece construction on both the mortal and pestle with no seams - makes it durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for grinding chalk base pills, works perfectly. I will never need another mortar and pestle. Cleans easy.
customer_reviews.author: ChuckBeattyxHOEYologist75to03

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice item, it's larger than I'd expected and was ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice item, it's larger than I'd expected and was a great deal for sale price I paid. I have a slightly smaller one made of stone, which is pretty, but, I cracked it with too much use. I crush pills daily for my dog, so, having one made of stainless steel is even better.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not for Garlic Smashing. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: When smashing garlic the garlic flies off. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Renan

customer_reviews.title: Not for crushing meds.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife to do her fathers meds. After crushing the meds did not come out of the mortar. I believe this would work very well with food however not good with crushing pills.
customer_reviews.author: Draw

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool. The cap is an added big plus for sure. Perfect for a quick small batch. And wast to clean as the inside is super smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Vinodh Remya

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Solid and high quality. This is a nice size too. Update- had this for over a month and use it 2 to 3 times a week for grinding up whole spices. It still looks as good as new, cleans easily and there are no dents or dings from smashing up peppercorns or cardamom seeds.
customer_reviews.author: LB2309Z

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality and modern mortar and pastel! We've used it almost everyday. And we are very pleased with the quality and durability for the price paid. Will definitely recommend them to anybody. No rust whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job of blending and grinding my eyeshadow pigments! While it is hard to clean out mica pigments from the grooves in the steel, it gets the job done for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: HannahP

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy as I thought it would be, but it is well made and seems like it will last a long time. Both the mortar and the pestle are hollow, but the gauge of the steel seems like it will hold up. I mostly use mine for mashing garlic and onions.
customer_reviews.author: Creative Crafty Lady

customer_reviews.title: It's very handy
customer_reviews.text: I expected that it will be a bigger mortar and pestle but over all the size and the weight it's easy to handle and store. Satisfied with my purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Quinto

customer_reviews.title: I first searched Bed Bath and Beyond locally to get it in a hurry but I didn't like the ones they offered
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mortar and pestle after realizing we would need it for one of our HelloFresh meals. I first searched Bed Bath and Beyond locally to get it in a hurry but I didn't like the ones they offered. I found this one on amazon and the free one day shipping was a perk, This set is beautiful! I read the comments before purchasing and yes the inside is a bit smooth for grinding seeds, but the grip on the bottom counteracts this. Easy to use, Easy to clean, and a Beautiful accent to the Kitchen. It was also the perfect size for making our pesto :)
customer_reviews.author: Indigo

customer_reviews.title: Works great, very heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdy, with a rubber bottom to grip the counter while you apply pressure. It works perfectly to turn pills into a fine powder, if you have an autistic child or elderly adult who has problems swallowing. Very heavy, durable. None porous surface, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Riverside

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value and quality! I was very happy to see how well it’s made. Very solid with thick metal everywhere. I was considering a porcelain mortar, but I think this stainless one will be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: David Guidos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to crush up pills for my cat and this does the job. Easy to clean and heavy enough that it does not move
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: giving them a beautiful, finish
customer_reviews.text: I found the Bekith Brushed Stainless Steel mortar and pestle to be impeccably constructed home kitchen utensils. They are constructed of heavy gauge stainless steel, giving them a beautiful, finish. I find them well suited for any kitchen tasks which require a mortar and pestle. I ordered two sets of these, and they were delivered promptly, with both items arriving in perfect condition. Kudos to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Donald H.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Mortor and Pestle.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. In truth, I have no reason to own one of these. I just like the looks of having one. The mortar and pestle are heavy, heavier than what you'd think they are. The bottom has a rubber thing on the bottom, I'm guessing so it doesn't slide all over the place when you're using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very small than my expectation. The cover broke after 4-5 days of use. And for this small size it is over priced. Its easy to clean but also not that worth it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Ojha AB

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! I use this to crush ginger and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! I use this to crush ginger and garlic to make a paste. I wish I had bought the one with the cover so my food doesn't go flying out. But this is a great product and can withstand a lot of pounding.
customer_reviews.author: Eclectic Reader

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this yesterday and am very pleased. The set is heavy duty and easy to clean. It may be slightly small for all the cooking we do but works well for crushing spices. Really like the non-skid bottom.
customer_reviews.author: J C Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to crush garlic or ginger
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to crush garlic or ginger, it slips away
customer_reviews.author: Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: It started to rust with a couple of uses. ...
customer_reviews.text: It started to rust with a couple of uses. I hand wash it and dry it right away. The pestle is not heavy and hence the garlic in the mortar keeps flying everywhere. The shape of the mortar is wide and that might be contributing factor to the flying garlic.
customer_reviews.author: jas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for crushing pills.
customer_reviews.text: I have to give my 3 yr old meds so I use this to help crush her pills. Works great easy to clean !
customer_reviews.author: Darkcar

customer_reviews.title: Thin base
customer_reviews.text: Feels good and heavy. Definitely will get scratched with use but that's expected since it's metal on metal. My only complaint would be the rubber base or lack of. Came with the pestle under the motar so theres a long indent in the rubber. Rubber is very thin.
customer_reviews.author: TCP

product_meta.title: Bekith Mortar and Pestle Sets 18/8 Brushed Stainless Steel Spice Grinder Pill Crusher Molcajete Herb Bowl
feature_bullets: Food grade 304 stainless steel construction, no mercury, no residual taste, durable and rustproof.
Functional design with non-skid base, the pestle feels substantial in your hand.
Translucent lid allows you to gauge your strikes while keeping flying debris from making a mess.
Easy to clean - Just rinse thoroughly under the tap to prepare it for the next use.
Multipurpose - From medical pills, to herbs and spices; from the pharmacy to your kitchen.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,882 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
